---

<!-- Do not edit this file. It is generated automatically -->

## throwIf() function

述語関数が true を返す場合、`err`の戻り値をスローします。

デフォルトのスロー関数は[identity](https://fxts.dev/docs/identity)です。

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function throwIf<T, N extends T>(
  predicate: (input: T) => input is N,
  err?: (input: N) => unknown,
): (input: T) => Exclude<T, N>;
```

## Example

```ts
pipe(
  fn(), // return type is string | undefined

  throwIf(isUndefined, (err) => Error("return of fn() is undefined")),
  // err is undefined, and it is return of fn

  (input) => input, // input is string
);
```

[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/throwIf.ts)
